plot: An Arab-American named Dena tells her story of what it's like to live in America as an Islamic activist wearing the hijab.
title: The Hijab of Dena
plot_es: An Arab-American named Dena tells her story of what it's like to live in America as an Islamic activist wearing the hijab.
plot_en: An Arab-American named Dena tells her story of what it's like to live in America as an Islamic activist wearing the hijab.
